abstract: Also, Rupert Murdoch defends his newspaper holdings, and Twitter bests Google and Facebook in mobile ad sales.
snippet: Also, Rupert Murdoch defends his newspaper holdings, and Twitter bests Google and Facebook in mobile ad sales.
lead_paragraph: On the day of a historic Supreme Court ruling on the health care law, two cable news outlets — CNN and Fox News Channel — briefly made themselves the story, Brian Stelter writes. In trying to synthesize a complicated ruling, both reported that the court had struck down the law’s individual mandate, when in fact, in a 5-to-4 vote, the court had upheld the mandate as a tax; at CNN, the mistake lingered for six minutes.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Rush to Report Health Care Ruling, and ‘As the Anchor Turns’
